4.6 million refugees & migrants have left Venezuela. 80% of them remain in Latin American & Caribbean countries.  

@Refugees & @UNmigration have launched a $1.35 billion appeal to meet their increasing humanitarian needs. https://t.co/68TbxRbIdK

Young filmmakers from around the 🌎 will receive the #PLURALplus19 awards 🏆 and share their stories of migration and diversity on Wednesday at UNHQ in NYC. 

Follow @PluralPlus for updates and watch the award ceremony live at 10 am NY time: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf #ForMigration https://t.co/iCFO4S2FMJ

Each year, an estimated 8 million tonnes of plastic ends up in our oceans.

Changing small, daily habits can have a big impact for #CleanSeas. https://t.co/drvBskNlih via @UNEP https://t.co/RNsejKWrUo

People are experiencing the significant impacts of extreme weather around the world, exacerbated by the climate crisis. 

Every one of us can take #ClimateAction to protect our planet & all its people: https://t.co/3JUFPTUqu5 https://t.co/9q6Tv6F0sc

Thanks to  #DNAJourney presenters @antanddec for visiting the iconic #UNGA Hall! 

Their tour, hosted by @refugees, highlighted how our DNA connects us - in ways we never imagined - to people & refugees around the world. https://t.co/lXPq5sRtDC

"We’re starting to learn what freedom is." 

3 decades after the fall of the #BerlinWall, young people reflect on what it means to grow up in a time of transition. @UNDPEurasia shares their stories. https://t.co/9QPUUzLYek #BerlinWall30 https://t.co/26BWWfhwa2
Global collaboration among teams of specialized researchers is increasingly being used to find solutions for shared challenges: https://t.co/tTnsBq6qWj #WIPR19 via @WIPO https://t.co/QGBFsoiqML

"We must remove all barriers to education. We must ensure, at a minimum, universal access to basic education for every child, everywhere. We simply cannot fail our children." 

-- @UN_PGA at #unescoGC in Paris.  https://t.co/XQ74ob8iuI https://t.co/wUJJTOQgUz

The task for those of us in power is not to solve the problems of young people, but to build frameworks so they can be at the centre of problem-solving. 

-- @antonioguterres at #unescoGC in Paris.  https://t.co/RB9aL4FgSL https://t.co/vFLmcR94hd

Universal health coverage means that all people have access to the quality health services they need, when and where they need them, without financial hardship.

@WHO explains how to achieve #HealthForAll: https://t.co/cbMC1CFiHu https://t.co/Q5yB4cIYuU

At opening of #NairobiSummit, @AminaJMohammed outlines UN's commitment to fulfilling promises of #ICPD25, including accelerating efforts to achieve gender equality. https://t.co/NpGq9xphV6 https://t.co/jTcHWdZW52

More than 800,000 children under the age of 5 died last year due to pneumonia. That's one child every 39 seconds.

On #WorldPneumoniaDay, @UNICEF is calling for urgent action to increase children's access to health care to save lives. https://t.co/GAEmSmyaUU

🎼The arts are good for you. 🎨

New @WHO report finds art can improve health & be more cost-effective than conventional medical treatment.
https://t.co/kpSyqilJCS

Universal access to sexual and reproductive health & rights is key to achieving gender equality. 

The #NairobiSummit will re-energize the global community to fulfill this promise for women and girls. https://t.co/9wT8xI1CmM #ICPD25 https://t.co/F21DkUdTnO

Nearly 2 million children in Yemen suffer from acute malnutrition due to conflict. @UNICEF is scaling up support to provide them with the nutritional support they need for their growth & development. #ChildrenUnderAttack 
https://t.co/5AbHNq4xka

"A peaceful and stable society is only possible when there are equal opportunities for all and respect for the rights and freedoms of all."

-- @antonioguterres at #ParisPeaceForum. https://t.co/n7i0lB5MDg https://t.co/RsxrKSiHeE

Less than 30% of scientific & technological researchers worldwide are women.

Debunking the myths that girls don't like the sciences & other gender stereotypes can help reverse this trend & achieve the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/bHqdRdCMR8 via @UN_Women https://t.co/yvuITjP1fw

Not even a sandstorm can stop a @WFP ✈️ from delivering aid to the Central African Republic.

1 in 4 people are affected by a mental disorder at some point in their lives.

"Collectively, you fight for human rights & against injustice. You venture bravely into the most difficult & dangerous places."

-- @AminaJMohammed thanks long-serving UN staff for their dedication.

The #BerlinWall, built in 1961, fell 30 years ago.

A section of it, entitled "Trophy of Civil Rights", was gifted to the UN by Germany and is on display at UNHQ in NYC as a reminder that we can all #StandUp4HumanRights. https://t.co/qwqnhy7vI5
.@CIJ_ICJ rules it has jurisdiction to hear Ukraine vs. Russian Federation case related to terrorist financing & racial discrimination. https://t.co/eOLuiy9piv https://t.co/JAzTTSRyfJ

Nearly 1 million people have been affected by unprecedented floods in South Sudan.

There are an estimated 272 million international migrants worldwide. 
1/3 of them come from just 10 countries. 
More facts from @UNMigration: https://t.co/WLTLhZ4MBk #ForMigration
 https://t.co/Gc6vOHNgg9

54% of people employed in tourism are women, compared to 39% in other sectors.
